'''Allah Rakha Rahman'''  (born [[6 January|January 6]], [[1966]] as '''A.S. Dileep Kumar''') is an Indian composer and musical producer. For his music for ''[[wikipedia:slumdog Millionaire|Slumdog Millionaire]]'', he won two Academy Awards. He composed the music for ''[[The Lord of the Rings (musical)]]'', along with [[V채rttin채]] and [[Christopher Nightingale]].
